channel.title: Possible missing firmware /lib/firmware/rtl_nic/rtl8168g-3.fw for module r816
channel.description:
hi there , i was practicing on kvm by repeating its steps , so i have tried it on debian jessie but this version of debian when i have installed it, i didnt choose "setup system utilities" . now when i used this command "sudo apt-get install qemu-kvm libvirt-bin virt-manager" to setup the kvm a repeatable message occureed at the end c this:-

item.title: Possible missing firmware /lib/firmware/rtl_nic/rtl8168g-3.fw for module r816
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
One “issue” solved. Not all info messages are issues. You have now a driver for a device you didn’t need or that somehow worked before already. (If you needed the device, you would know.) Therefore created a new issue. Installed a non-free package.

Read full topic
